sentences: Susan Roshan  (Persian: سوزان روشن) (born 23 September 1967) is an Iranian singer, who currently lives in California United States.

Susan Roshan  (Persian: سوزان روشن) (born 23 September 1967) is an Iranian singer, who currently lives in California United States. After the Iranian Revolution, she moved to the United States with her parents and brother at the age of twelve.
